name: cdeqab
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, wff w0, wff w1
body: |- wcdeq(s0, s1, wceq(cab(s2, w0), cab(s2, w1)))
bodyPretty: ⊢ CondEq(s0 = s1 → { s2 | w0 } = { s2 | w1 })

stmt.origin: cdeqi(s0, s1, wceq(cab(s2, w0), cab(s2, w1)))

|- wcdeq(s0, s1, wceq(cab(s2, w0), cab(s2, w1)))

⊣ d(s2, s0 = s1)
⊣ CondEq(s0 = s1 →(w0 ↔ w1))
